style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 20.90%;top: 2.37%;width: 9.68%;height: 1.89%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 20.27%;top: 4.17%;width: 10.64%;height: 2.46%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.56%;top: 11.31%;width: 12.66%;height: 3.14%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 60px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 51.22%;top: 1.27%;width: 33.19%;height: 3.67%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;font-weight: bold;

text:
対処できたのね
私のグレムリン達に。
闘志はお母さん譲りね
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 10.90%;top: 26.37%;width: 17.66%;height: 1.95%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 35%;

text:
おいで
２人とも
いとこに…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 37.82%;top: 19.80%;width: 12.23%;height: 1.81%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 30px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 69.63%;top: 20.07%;width: 12.13%;height: 1.57%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;font-weight: bold;

text:
ありがとう!
探してる間
心臓発作しそう
だったわ!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 32.82%;top: 36.43%;width: 11.28%;height: 2.72%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
君が心臓発作なんて
絶対ありえないだろ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 42.29%;top: 38.62%;width: 16.17%;height: 2.25%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 40.27%;top: 41.28%;width: 14.36%;height: 1.21%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
誰かと思えば
エミコちゃん!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 21.12%;top: 43.71%;width: 12.13%;height: 1.78%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
この小さな
モンスターは
君の子よね!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 22.93%;top: 45.31%;width: 8.94%;height: 2.55%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
遅れてゴメン!
探す必要があって…
エミコ? どうしたの?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 74.20%;top: 43.42%;width: 17.98%;height: 2.75%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 5.80%;top: 77.36%;width: 12.98%;height: 1.39%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 9.52%;top: 78.63%;width: 12.34%;height: 1.36%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 80.80%;top: 81.18%;width: 14.89%;height: 2.93%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
やっと
また会えて
嬉しいわ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 21.54%;top: 86.09%;width: 12.45%;height: 1.95%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;
